data.name: Address
data.value: Address: Kurchatova str 1, 220180, Minsk, Republic of Belarus.

data.name: ContactsShortDescription
data.value: Contacts with the heads of the department, the administration. Familiarize yourself with the location of the laboratory, the shortest way on foot, on public, personal transport. You can leave a text message on the page.

data.name: EducationShortDescription
data.value: Educational process of students, lesson plans, seminars, Quick Learning. Here you can find the description of the educational process, get acquainted with the current teachers and feedback on the work of the teaching staff of the laboratory and the Department of System Analysis and Computer Modeling.

data.name: HistoryShortDescription
data.value: The history of the creation, the heads of the laboratory and the department, conferences and reports on the years. On this page you can find a detailed description of the presentations at the seminars, PHD, IEEE, reports on the seminars and archival documents.

data.name: PeopleShortDescription
data.value: Participants of the laboratory, teachers and students of the department. In this section you can get acquainted with the teaching staff of the laboratory and the department, as well as with the most active students and their achievements in teaching and scientific activity. Also you can get acquainted with the best employees of the month.

data.name: ProjectsShortDescription
data.value: Projects and achievements of our students. Here you can find a description of projects, ideas and scientific reports of laboratory participants and the Department of System Analysis and Computer Simulation. For the very important result of the studies and further application of the implemented projects.

data.name: Welcome
data.value: Welcome to the Student Resesrch Laboratory "Systems Processes Modelling and Analysis"!

data.name: CollaborationIntro
data.value: Our student science laboratory maintains close contacts with leading foreign scientific laboratories and universities. Among them are the Luxembourg Institute of Health (LiH), the European Molecular Biological Laboratory (EMBL) and others.

data.name: CVInto
data.value: Here you can get acquainted with the library of resumes of graduates of our faculty

data.name: ProjectsIntro
data.value: Information about scientific projects carried out by the staff of the laboratory and teachers of the department.
